Real Time EOL Cc PST Hi All We have new realtime HTLM based EOL plasma models Simple XMLXSLT based configuration see attached Following model is presently used by the West Desk the spread is marked against Hhub TickerGetScreenaspnamewest Also we have new Market data strips java based Supported by Market Data group Manager Danielle Marcinkowski fundyplasmasiteFinancialhtml refer to following link for all models ProjectsplasmaProjectdefaultasp NB Where there point missing on the EOL models denotes a deactivated product Tokenised products are cycled based on their activity status ie cash products generally cycle around to EOL ids these are switched at around am each trade day The EOL models can be easily configured for any EOL product Let me know if your interested Colin

RE Commodity FundamentalsPST Firstly your access to the Gas Message Board has been granted Secondly what charting tool are you using for your graphs ie Annual Demand Growth etc Thanks Colin Original Message From Richey Cooper Sent Tuesday June PM To Tonks Colin Heizenrader Timothy Mckeel Richard Subject RE Commodity Fundamentals Colin nice job on the look and feel reminds me of plasticcom which is a sweet site it will definitely be part of my morning tour also can i get access to the gas message board Cooper Original Message From Tonks Colin Sent Monday June PM To Heizenrader Timothy Mckeel Richard Richey Cooper Subject Commodity Fundamentals Just to let you guys know that we officially released Commodity Fundamentals to the Gas Trade floor This site presents the Gas Traders with a single point of entry to ENA Gas EGM EIM and Research fundamentals information Please take a look I would appreciate any commentsfeedback I understand that some of your traders are using the site to access Gas information Colin Tonks

Franky Sulistio Cc Spst Franky Sulistio will shortly be joining the Gas Fundamentals IT group Franky was previously working on the Entelligence Project His initial role will cover the following areas Floor support am onwards Plasmas th Floor Model general floor software support Responsible for the rearchitecturedevelopement of all plasma based EOL models Responsible for the rearchitecturedevelopement of all plasma based Market Data models Support for Gas Fundamentals Systems ie Jaguar Reporting and Jaguar Harvesting Thanks Colin

EOL Products Cc Spst Hunter it appears that we are being more and more exposed to the various products associated with EOL My concern is that no one in my group really has a complete understand of many of the key concepts in this area ie The difference between physical and financial products Explanation of the concept of Basis Differential The difference between term cash prompt ROM etc How the Nymex products affect the above ie auto hedge What are the downstream systems ie Sitara for physical etc Why trade physical over financial The various rules associated with each product ie cash only trades until ish and then becomes a new product for the next trade day How to calculate positions based on forward curves etc As you can see from my points above my knowledge in this area is really fragmented and since the EOL products you trade are highly associated with or function on the floor can I suggest that we arrange a weekly training session for my group with someone from your team ie Martin he is been very helpful to date But it important that its someone who understands that we have no real financial backgrounds My hope is that if we have a better understanding of how you work we can Be more proactive in providing tools based on above principles Speed up development ie Pipeline economic sheet took far too long Help us architect better solutions for the plasmas in the future Anyway let me know your thoughts I am unsure if any of the above knowledge is available outside of our domain hence I have copied Steve Stock on this mail Colin

FW EOL Deal data Cc Spst Dave I wrote to Michael on April th but received no reply Its a little frustrating that all request need to go through you Why is this so Colin Original Message From Tonks Colin Sent Monday April PM To Guadarrama Michael Cc Pan Ronggen Subject FW EOL Deal data Michael could you answer the following Thanks Colin Original Message From Pan Ronggen Sent Monday April PM To Tonks Colin Subject EOL Deal data Colin Can you get me the XML schemas or DTDs for EOLEOLPRODDISTRIBUTORNEWDEALSITARA and EOLEOLPRODDISTRIBUTORNEWDEALTAGG I need to figure out the mappings for conterparty id price volume etc Attached are the msgs captured on the TIB Thanks Ronggen Pan x EBC

RE plasma business Cc Spst Paul just to confirm the desk location above where the screen can go is e We have verbal confirmation from Hunter Shively VP Trading that we can proceed with the new plasma installation Once again thanks Colin ps any idea when this will happen pps I need to bring in my playstation Original Message From Cline Paul Sent Tuesday May AM To Tonks Colin Subject plasma business Colin Can you please let me know the position where the new plasma will go also do you need to get permission from the aesthetics police to put it on the wall Im arranging power TV and data now PC

Training Cc Spst Martin Cuilla has kindly agreed to offer his time to help us understand some of the key concepts as trading Natural Gas Therefore starting sometime next week we will be arranging a weekly QA Please forward me any questionstopics you wish to discuss so we can organize an itinerary ie What products do we trade How do you manage risk What does this floor trade on a daily basis Overview his job function How is PL calculated throughoutend of day The difference between physical and financial products The difference between Nymex Basis Cash Prompt Physical Prompt Financial Term ROM etc Explanation of the concept of Basis Differential How do transportation costs affect Basis calculations How the Nymex products affect the above ie auto hedge What are the downstream systems ie Sitara for physical etc Colin

RE EOL Deal dataSpst I apologies for the vagueness of my email however as you know we have attempted to build various implementationsprototypesplasma applications involving EOL data The basis of most of our realtime work is around the messages distributed by EOL over tibco ie product bidoffervolume information In addition I was approached by the EOL team because there were concerns that certain traders were hitting the EOL database too frequently Dutch Q PL report The only way to resolve this would be use the realtime EOL deal transaction information Thus I corresponded on many occasions with various people in the EOL group requesting information to help us gain a further understanding of the EOL system in order to facilitate the above In addition I requested a meeting with certain EOL team member this was declined response was that they did not have enough information Out of frustration I contacted David Forster He asked me to forward all questions to him directly and he would pass them to Michael Guadarrama with a note to me saying that if my question was not answered by the following day let me know etc I really dont have the time to go through this painful process of having to forward my questions to a VP So I tried to contact Michael directly the following transcript is the consequence Not to sound like a broken record Hunter but EOL data analysis is becoming more and more important to Gas Fundamentals and without support from the EOL group it can only make our life more difficult Colin Original Message From Shively Hunter S Sent Tuesday May PM To Tonks Colin Subject RE EOL Deal data I dont understand this Original Message From Tonks Colin Sent Tuesday May AM To Forster David Cc Shively Hunter S Subject FW EOL Deal data Dave I wrote to Michael on April th but received no reply Its a little frustrating that all request need to go through you Why is this so Colin Original Message From Tonks Colin Sent Monday April PM To Guadarrama Michael Cc Pan Ronggen Subject FW EOL Deal data Michael could you answer the following Thanks Colin Original Message From Pan Ronggen Sent Monday April PM To Tonks Colin Subject EOL Deal data Colin Can you get me the XML schemas or DTDs for EOLEOLPRODDISTRIBUTORNEWDEALSITARA and EOLEOLPRODDISTRIBUTORNEWDEALTAGG I need to figure out the mappings for conterparty id price volume etc Attached are the msgs captured on the TIB File TAGGtxt File SITARAtxt Thanks Ronggen Pan x EBC

FW Site metrics for Fundametals groups Cc Spst HunterChris fyi progress has been made to the web based site stats reports We will meet with the developer today to go over what been complete to date sitetrack in addition the changes to the Gas Message board in dev are nearly complete The is currently owned by another group we intend to take this over in due course MsgBoardChatmsgframeasp there may be an error posting to the above message board should resolved today Please forward comments and feedback Colin

Commodity FundamentalsSpst Hunter I spoke with Heather Purcell who is kind of like the intermediate between IT and business in terms of web based commodity information Basically I informed her that CF was now being released to the gas traderoriginators and showed her the message board features for each commodity have a look on the site very cool Anyway when I proposed to her that it would be in her interest to encourage her users to use CF and that it will not allow a single point of reference for weather information etc I experienced immediate resistance Heather basically informed me that her boss Shankman would not be using the site because it did not contain the power information My response was why not use the site at least to facilitate the communication between crude gas in the meantime basically integral markets anyway I think the basic problem is that Heather et al have spent a great deal of time money on the design of all or so EGM sites prob over k and now her is one site that does it all and more I know you realize the issues but for this to be a completely effect tool for the traders we really need buy in from EGM I appreciate Heathers resistance however you cant stop progress What do you think Colin

RE Plant Outage Task Cc Matt need a time estimate for the following can we do this asap thnx Colin Original Message From Tonks Colin Sent Tuesday May PM To Dronet David Subject FW Plant Outage Task Well I managed to get a user to document Can we look at the following well need a date for testprod Colin Original Message From Smith Matt Sent Tuesday May PM To Tonks Colin Cc Holst Keith Gaskill Chris Woodstrom David Subject Plant Outage Task Colin Per our conversation I have outlined Keiths task for the team Background Portland maintains in their database a table called PlantOutage Records in that table each contain an outage BeginOutageDate EndOutageDate CapacityOut and OutageReason Records also include a PlantID key field for PlantCharacteristics table and a PlantUnitID key field for Unitcharacteristics table The PlantCharacteristics table contains a WSCCRegion field and the Unitcharacteristics table contains a FuelDesignation field Portland has a stored procedure that for a specified date range can calculate for each date the sum of CapacityOut for all outage records where the date falls between the BeginOutageDate and the EndOutageDate I have inlcuded the results of this storaged procedure in the attached file Our task is similar but requires more detailed subgrouping of the data Objective The objective is to return the Sum of CapacityOut by each possible subgrouping for each day in a range say to There are roughly five possible parameters for FuelDesignation seven for WSCCRegion and two for OutageReason The resulting query would return approximately values for each day within the specified range Format Ultimately we will have the date in one excel sheet with dates down the left and each of the sub groupings across the top It would be most convenient if the results of the query were formatted in this way Alternatively we can use a pivot table if the results of a list query are provided If the second option is used we will need to get the data in two separate lists since excel can only hand rows In this case we would use the OutageReason grouping which only has two parameters to split out the two lists Thanks for your help Mat File OutageGraphbyFuelCSV
